verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הוֹשֵׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H1954><s%> that came unto Hosea בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּאֵרִ֔י <S%H882><s%> of Beeri בִּימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> in the days עֻזִּיָּ֥ה <S%H5818><s%> of Uzziah יוֹתָ֛ם <S%H3147><s%> Jotham אָחָ֥ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz יְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבִימֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> and in the days יָרָבְעָ֥ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

תְּחִלַּ֥ת <S%H8462><s%> The beginning דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> of the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּהוֹשֵׁ֑עַ <S%H1954><s%> by Hosea פ וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הוֹשֵׁ֗עַ <S%H1954><s%> to Hosea לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> take לְךָ֞ אֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> unto thee a wife זְנוּנִים֙ <S%H2183><s%> of whoredoms וְיַלְדֵ֣י <S%H3206><s%> and children זְנוּנִ֔ים <S%H2183><s%> of whoredoms כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זָנֹ֤ה <S%H2181><s%> hath committed great תִזְנֶה֙ <S%H2181><s%> whoredom הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the land מֵֽאַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> [departing] from יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיִּקַּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גֹּ֖מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Gomer בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter דִּבְלָ֑יִם <S%H1691><s%> of Diblaim וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> which conceived וַתֵּֽלֶד־ <S%H3205><s%> and bare ל֖וֹ בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> him a son

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> unto קְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> unto him Call שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יִזְרְעֶ֑אל <S%H3157><s%> Jezreel כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> yet מְעַ֗ט <S%H4592><s%> for yet a little וּפָ֨קַדְתִּ֜י <S%H6485><s%> [while] and I will avenge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּמֵ֤י <S%H1818><s%> the blood יִזְרְעֶאל֙ <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> upon the house יֵה֔וּא <S%H3058><s%> of Jehu וְהִ֨שְׁבַּתִּ֔י <S%H7673><s%> and will cause to cease מַמְלְכ֖וּת <S%H4468><s%> the kingdom בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass at that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> I וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <S%H7665><s%> that I will break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> the bow יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel

וַתַּ֤הַר <S%H2029><s%> And she conceived again עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בַּ֔ת <S%H1323><s%> a daughter וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And [God] said ל֔וֹ קְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> unto him Call שְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> her name לֹ֣א רֻחָ֑מָה <S%H3819><s%> Loruhamah כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> will no אוֹסִ֜יף <S%H3254><s%> for I will no more ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again אֲרַחֵם֙ <S%H7355><s%> have mercy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> would נָשֹׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> but I will utterly אֶשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> take them away לָהֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> upon the house יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲרַחֵ֔ם <S%H7355><s%> But I will have mercy וְהֽוֹשַׁעְתִּ֖ים <S%H3467><s%> and will save בַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> them by the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and will not אֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֗ם <S%H3467><s%> and will not save בְּקֶ֤שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> them by bow וּבְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> nor by sword וּבְמִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> nor by battle בְּסוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> by horses וּבְפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6571><s%> nor by horsemen

וַתִּגְמֹ֖ל <S%H1580><s%> Now when she had weaned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣א רֻחָ֑מָה <S%H3819><s%> Loruhamah וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> she conceived וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> a son

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said קְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> [God] Call שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name לֹ֣א עַמִּ֑י <S%H3818><s%> Loammi כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> for ye [are] not my people וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶֽם׃ ס

וְֽ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> become מִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> Yet the number בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כְּח֣וֹל <S%H2344><s%> shall be as the sand הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִמַּ֖ד <S%H4058><s%> which cannot be measured וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִסָּפֵ֑ר <S%H5608><s%> nor numbered וְֽ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> become בִּמְק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and it shall come to pass [that] in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Where יֵאָמֵ֤ר <S%H559><s%> where it was said לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> unto them Ye [are] not my people אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> It יֵאָמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> [there] it shall be said לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> to them בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto them [Ye are] the sons אֵֽל־ <S%H410><s%> God חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

וְ֠נִקְבְּצוּ <S%H6908><s%> be gathered בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> Then shall the children יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> together וְשָׂמ֥וּ <S%H7760><s%> and appoint לָהֶ֛ם רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> themselves one וְעָל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> and they shall come up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For גָד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> for great י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [shall be] the day יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel
